FuncDef:
The radius-server group command sets the RADIUS server group for a prepaid profile.
The undo radius-server group cancels the RADIUS server group for a prepaid profile.
By default, no RADIUS server group has been configured for a prepaid profile.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the RADIUS server group.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters containing uppercase letters (A to Z), lowercase letters (a to z), numbers (0 to 9), punctuation mark ".", and conjunctive punctuation such as dash "-" and underline "_".

Examples: Info: Create a new server group
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the service requires a specified RADIUS server to authenticate users and conduct accounting, you can set the RADIUS server group to be used by running this command.
Prerequisites
The server group has already been configured.
Configuration Impact
After the radius-server group command is run, the specified RADIUS server group is used for authentication and accounting.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
